import{useRef,useMemo}from"react";import{Canvas,useFrame}from"@react-three/fiber";import{EffectComposer,Bloom}from"@react-three/postprocessing";import*as THREE from"three";/* ============================================================
   Helper: generate points along a helix
   ============================================================ */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function helixPoints(radius,height,turns,segments){let phase=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:0;const pts=[];for(let i=0;i<=segments;i++){const t=i/segments;const angle=turns*Math.PI*2*t+phase;pts.push(new THREE.Vector3(Math.cos(angle)*radius,height*t-height/2,Math.sin(angle)*radius));}return pts;}/* ============================================================
   The 3‑D DNA double helix mesh group
   ============================================================ */function DnaHelix(){const groupRef=useRef();// Slow continuous rotation
useFrame((_,delta)=>{if(groupRef.current){groupRef.current.rotation.y+=delta*0.25;}});const{strand1Geo,strand2Geo,rungs}=useMemo(()=>{const R=1.2;// helix radius
const H=12;// total height
const TURNS=3.5;// number of full twists
const SEG=300;// smoothness
// Two strands offset by π
const pts1=helixPoints(R,H,TURNS,SEG,0);const pts2=helixPoints(R,H,TURNS,SEG,Math.PI);const curve1=new THREE.CatmullRomCurve3(pts1);const curve2=new THREE.CatmullRomCurve3(pts2);const s1=new THREE.TubeGeometry(curve1,SEG,0.12,12,false);const s2=new THREE.TubeGeometry(curve2,SEG,0.12,12,false);// Base‑pair rungs connecting the two strands
const rungData=[];const RUNG_COUNT=60;for(let i=0;i<RUNG_COUNT;i++){const t=i/RUNG_COUNT;const p1=curve1.getPoint(t);const p2=curve2.getPoint(t);rungData.push({p1,p2});}return{strand1Geo:s1,strand2Geo:s2,rungs:rungData};},[]);// Shared materials
const cyanMat=useMemo(()=>new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color:new THREE.Color(0.05,0.4,0.7),emissive:new THREE.Color(0.0,0.5,0.9),emissiveIntensity:1.8,roughness:0.3,metalness:0.6,transparent:true,opacity:0.92}),[]);const purpleMat=useMemo(()=>new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color:new THREE.Color(0.3,0.1,0.55),emissive:new THREE.Color(0.45,0.15,0.85),emissiveIntensity:1.6,roughness:0.3,metalness:0.6,transparent:true,opacity:0.92}),[]);const rungMat=useMemo(()=>new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color:new THREE.Color(0.15,0.25,0.5),emissive:new THREE.Color(0.1,0.3,0.65),emissiveIntensity:1.0,roughness:0.5,metalness:0.4,transparent:true,opacity:0.6}),[]);const sphereMat1=useMemo(()=>new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color:new THREE.Color(0.1,0.6,0.85),emissive:new THREE.Color(0.0,0.6,1.0),emissiveIntensity:2.2,roughness:0.2,metalness:0.7}),[]);const sphereMat2=useMemo(()=>new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color:new THREE.Color(0.4,0.15,0.7),emissive:new THREE.Color(0.5,0.2,1.0),emissiveIntensity:2.0,roughness:0.2,metalness:0.7}),[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("group",{ref:groupRef,rotation:[0,0,0.55],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("mesh",{geometry:strand1Geo,material:cyanMat}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("mesh",{geometry:strand2Geo,material:purpleMat}),rungs.map((r,i)=>{const mid=new THREE.Vector3().addVectors(r.p1,r.p2).multiplyScalar(0.5);const dir=new THREE.Vector3().subVectors(r.p2,r.p1);const len=dir.length();dir.normalize();// Orient cylinder along the rung direction
const quat=new THREE.Quaternion();quat.setFromUnitVectors(new THREE.Vector3(0,1,0),dir);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("group",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("mesh",{position:[mid.x,mid.y,mid.z],quaternion:quat,material:rungMat,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("cylinderGeometry",{args:[0.03,0.03,len,6]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("mesh",{position:[r.p1.x,r.p1.y,r.p1.z],material:sphereMat1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("sphereGeometry",{args:[0.16,16,16]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("mesh",{position:[r.p2.x,r.p2.y,r.p2.z],material:sphereMat2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("sphereGeometry",{args:[0.16,16,16]})})]},i);})]});}/* ============================================================
   Floating particle field
   ============================================================ */function Particles(){const ref=useRef();const count=80;const positions=useMemo(()=>{const arr=new Float32Array(count*3);for(let i=0;i<count;i++){arr[i*3]=(Math.random()-0.5)*10;arr[i*3+1]=(Math.random()-0.5)*14;arr[i*3+2]=(Math.random()-0.5)*6;}return arr;},[]);useFrame((_,delta)=>{if(ref.current){const pos=ref.current.geometry.attributes.position.array;for(let i=0;i<count;i++){pos[i*3+1]+=delta*0.15;if(pos[i*3+1]>7)pos[i*3+1]=-7;}ref.current.geometry.attributes.position.needsUpdate=true;}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("points",{ref:ref,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("bufferGeometry",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("bufferAttribute",{attach:"attributes-position",count:count,array:positions,itemSize:3})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pointsMaterial",{size:0.06,color:new THREE.Color(0.2,0.6,1),transparent:true,opacity:0.5,sizeAttenuation:true})]});}/* ============================================================
   Main exported component
   ============================================================ */function DnaAnimation(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"100%",height:"100%",background:"#060612"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Canvas,{camera:{position:[0,0,7],fov:50},gl:{antialias:true,alpha:false},dpr:[1,2],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("color",{attach:"background",args:["#060612"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ambientLight",{intensity:0.15}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pointLight",{position:[3,4,5],intensity:1.5,color:new THREE.Color(0.3,0.7,1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pointLight",{position:[-3,-2,3],intensity:1.0,color:new THREE.Color(0.5,0.2,0.9)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pointLight",{position:[0,0,4],intensity:0.6,color:new THREE.Color(0.2,0.5,1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DnaHelix,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Particles,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EffectComposer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bloom,{intensity:1.2,luminanceThreshold:0.15,luminanceSmoothing:0.9,mipmapBlur:true})})]})});}export default DnaAnimation;
